sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('about'); const [teamMembers, setTeamMembers] = useState([]); const [testimonials, setTestimonials] = useState([]); // Mock data - In a real application, this would come from an API useEffect(() => { setTeamMembers([ { id: 1, name: 'Dr. Sarah Johnson', role: 'Founder & Medical Director', image: '/images/team/doctor1.jpg', bio: 'Dr. Sarah Johnson has over 15 years of experience in medical education. She founded FIGS Medical Education to provide quality training to medical students preparing for their exams.' }, { id: 2, name: 'Dr. Michael Brown', role: 'NExT Specialist & Lead Instructor', image: '/images/team/doctor2.jpg', bio: 'Dr. Brown specializes in preparing students for the NExT exam with his comprehensive knowledge of the curriculum and experience as an examiner.' }, { id: 3, name: 'Dr. Emily Davis', role: 'Clinical Skills Trainer', image: '/images/team/doctor3.jpg', bio: 'Dr. Davis focuses on teaching clinical skills and practical examination techniques to ensure students are well-prepared for their clinical assessments.' }, { id: 4, name: 'Dr. Robert Wilson', role: 'Medical Education Researcher', image: '/images/team/doctor4.jpg', bio: 'With a PhD in Medical Education, Dr. Wilson develops innovative teaching methodologies and creates comprehensive study materials for our students.' } ]); setTestimonials([ { id: 1, name: 'John D.', role: 'Medical Student', content: 'The NExT preparation course was exactly what I needed. The instructors are knowledgeable and the practice questions were very similar to the actual exam.', rating: 5 }, { id: 2, name: 'Priya S.', role: 'MBBS Graduate', content: 'I had struggled with clinical assessments, but after taking the clinical skills course, I passed with confidence. Highly recommended!', rating: 5 }, { id: 3, name: 'Mark T.', role: 'Final Year Student', content: 'The online platform is user-friendly and the content is comprehensive. The mock exams really helped me identify my weak areas.', rating: 4 }, { id: 4, name: 'Lisa W.', role: 'International Medical Graduate', content: 'As an IMG, I found the courses specifically designed for international students very helpful. The instructors understand our unique challenges.', rating: 5 } ]); }, []); const renderStars = (rating) => { const stars = []; for (let i = 1; i <= 5; i++) { stars.push( ); } return stars; }; return (

About FIGS Medical Education

Empowering the next generation of medical professionals

{activeTab === 'about' && (

Excellence in Medical Education

FIGS Medical Education was established in 2015 with a singular focus: to provide exceptional education and training to medical students and professionals. Our institution has grown to become a trusted name in medical education, particularly for NExT exam preparation and continued medical education.

We offer a comprehensive range of courses designed by experienced medical professionals and educators. Our curriculum is regularly updated to reflect the latest developments in medical science and examination standards.

Our faculty consists of practicing physicians, medical educators, and researchers who bring real-world experience and expertise to the classroom. We believe in a student-centered approach to education, where individual needs and learning styles are recognized and accommodated.

At FIGS, we combine traditional teaching methods with innovative technologies to create an engaging and effective learning environment. Our state-of-the-art facilities and online learning platform provide students with the resources they need to succeed.

)} {activeTab === 'mission' && (

Our Mission & Values

At FIGS Medical Education, our mission is to empower medical students and professionals with the knowledge, skills, and confidence they need to excel in their examinations and careers. We are committed to educational excellence, innovation, and student success.

Educational Excellence

We are committed to providing the highest quality medical education through rigorous curriculum development and exceptional teaching.

Student-Centered Approach

We place our students at the center of everything we do, adapting our methods to meet diverse learning needs and providing personalized support.

Innovation

We continuously explore and implement innovative teaching methodologies and technologies to enhance the learning experience.

Integrity

We uphold the highest standards of professionalism, ethics, and integrity in all our interactions and educational offerings.

Our Goals

  • To prepare students thoroughly for the NExT exam with comprehensive courses and practice materials
  • To provide ongoing professional development for practicing medical professionals
  • To make quality medical education accessible through flexible learning options
  • To foster a supportive community of learners and educators committed to excellence in healthcare
  • To contribute to the advancement of medical education through research and innovation
)} {activeTab === 'team' && (

Meet Our Expert Team

Our team consists of experienced medical professionals, educators, and support staff dedicated to helping you achieve your goals. Each member brings unique expertise and passion to create a comprehensive learning experience.

{teamMembers.map(member => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

))}
)}

What Our Students Say

{testimonials.map(testimonial => (
{renderStars(testimonial.rating)}

"{testimonial.content}"

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.role}

))}

Ready to Start Your Journey?

Join thousands of medical students who have succeeded with FIGS Medical Education.

Browse Courses Contact Us
); }; export default About;
